title: WTF RIOT
body: **Can someone tell me why RIOT balances the fuck outta rank games?!! it's ridiculous! I win about a couple rank games by working my way up into getting promoted, then all of a sudden riot decides to balance these wins to losses... i lose about 7 games in a row too were i get freaken DEMOTED!.. like wtf riot! I just putted in my hard work not just to get demoted?!  I try not to be a ass and talk trash to players but it hits that certain point were you just want to feed and tilt.. i know i'm not the only who gets this crap but riot needs to fix this. losing so many games because you get que with dumb asses and i feel like riot is purposely doing this us because they are.. One does not do good to get que'd with lower elos.. riot needs to solve this back to back crap because no one wants to put there best into a game then watch riot "BALANCE" the hell out of their hard work for you to lose everything. it's unbelievable and it's pissing me off and i hope they change it and for a reason they need to update a faster que  because it takes forever **

replies.body:
I also want to point out in your match history you got one game going 4/11 ,4/8,1/5, you ONE a game going 2/8 ( I mean that team carried the F out of you).

So far boss if all you can play really is tryndamere I can see why you getting rekted. This isn't a riot issue, they can't match make you with people who can keep carrying you into Elo where you can't hold your own ground. {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Its not Riot dude, if u win alot in a row, your MMR goes up alot. And u start playing against better and better opponents.

He did complain about his ****TEAMMATES****
Because riot does not decide anything, it is all random luck and the rules of probability.

The system matches people with higher mmr with higher mmr people and lower mmr with lower mmr people. Basically, winners get matched with winners and losers get matched with losers. Except if you're on a winning streak, it will give you consecutively harder people to beat until you lose, and then it will snowball you downwards from there. The system is full of shit honestly.
Well you lost 7 games in a row, and expected "Not" to get demoted? o.o
